name: Dream Reaper
description:
Reach the sleeping person to reap their dreams! Use the reapers phase ability to pass through doors and reach the goal.
 
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 52 "Harvest" using Unity

Items:
Keys unlock doors
Scythes kill enemies
Hourglasses freeze time

Controls:
Arrow Keys to Move
Z to Phase (through doors and some other stuff too!)
X to Use Items
C to Wait
Backspace to Restart Levels
Escape to Pause

Dev Team - Three Dudes and a Rat
Orhu - Programming, Design, Sound
sullycollins - Programming, Design
RattleEmBoys - Programming, Design
Ratman - Art
